amendment.description: To require a study on the application of technology from the Robust Nuclear Earth Penetrator Program to conventional hard and deeply buried target weapons development programs.

vote.text: Amendment SA 767 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 767 proposed by Senator Nelson FL. (consideration: CR S6805-6806; text: CR S6805-6806) To require a study on the application of technology from the Robust Nuclear Earth Penetrator Program to conventional hard and deeply buried target weapons development programs.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 767 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 767 proposed by Senator Nelson FL.
